modName: SED7 Accessories and Piercings Merchant - NSFW
summary:
Want all kinds of kinky piercings but don\'t want them to clutter your Jewelry tab at the forge? This is the solution!

**REQUIRES**
SED7 Accessoire Piercingset for CBBE3 by Shazhar
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4pt]::::[color=yellow]Full Credit goes to Shazhar for his great piercings and allowing me to publish this little mod[/color] ::::[/size][/b]
[b]Special thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/925416]Mayatola[/url] for his constant support, check out his amazing screenshots, freaking amazing work :)[/b]
[size=4pt][b]REQUIRED[/b]
Before using my mod, you must download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20655]SED7 Accessoire Piercingset for CBBE3 by Shazhar[/url]
[b][u](Download the file named SED7-Allin1 Piercingset v1.4)[/u][/b]
After that, read the installation instructions below..[/size]


[b][size=3pt]::::::::: Version History ::::::::::[/size][/b]
[b]v1.0[/b]
[u]A->[/u] Initial release
[u]B->[/u] Scheherazade stays 24/7 at the BanneredMare Inn in Whiterun and her shop is open 24/7 as well

[b][size=3pt]::::::::: My Other Mods ::::::::::[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521]Olivia Wilde - Housecarl Replacer[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34273]Namaofs Watchtower - A Player Home[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31375]Hearthfire Alternative Library[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29633]Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26437]Angelina Jolie - Standalone Follower[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29635]Olivia Wilde - Nude Patches[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26611]Angelina Jolie - Nude Patches[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24894]Severus Jewelry Collection Merchant[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24421]Adult Toys Merchant - NSFW[/url][/size][/b]


[b][size=3pt]:::::::: Detailed Description ::::::::::[/size][/b]
This is my 2nd attempt at modding, so I barely have any experience therefore any helpful feedback would be wonderful..

I loved SED7 accessories and piercings but they cluttered the Jewelry tab at the blacksmith plus they required lots of different crafting material to make, I didn\'t like that, so I decided to make them purchasable from their own unique merchant.

The merchant is called Scheherazade, she is a redgaurd, she can be found inside the BanneredMare all day long, sells all the accessories and piercings that SED7 offers for the CBBEv3 body and some for bettermales except the PrinceAlbert package, I will include these later on in the mod when Shazhar combines them into a single mod.

She can\'t be killed, her shop respawns like any other merchant so don\'t worry if you buy all the accessories and want even more, 

[b]Note[/b]: When I created her in CK, I had the CBBEv3 body by Caliente, lips and brows from Better Females, Covereyes by MrLenski, CBBE face pack, Killer Keos skimpy armors and clothes by Killer Keo. Non of this is included in this mod so I\'m not sure what she will look like with your game, but as for her outfit, she will use whatever version of \"Tavern Wench\" that you currently have in your game, will need feedback on this from people who use other body/cosmetic mods, don\'t be afraid to post pictures.

I have reduced the original values for all the accessories and piercings, because they became insanely expensive when they turned into merchant items, so in order to reduce the prices considerably I needed to have high haggling perk which I don\'t have, so I lowered their base values to half of the original.

I have also removed the armor rating they had (piercings shouldn\'t provide protection :P), changed their category from being lightarmor to be like regular Jewelry, all the items should be enchantable like regular jewelry as well.


[b][size=3pt]::::::::: Future Plans ::::::::[/size][/b]
I will try to give her a daily routine like regular npc merchants (goes to other places, do other stuff during the day).

The current accessories and piercings are for the CBBEv3 body and some for bettermales body, if accessories for other bodies were made I will make a shop for them in this mod as well after I get the permission to do so.


[b][size=3pt]::::::: Installation Instructions :::::::[/size][/b]
[b]REQUIRED[/b]
1- Download and install SED7 Accessoire Piercingset for CBBE3 and bettermales by Shazhar
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20655]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20655[/url]
(Download the file named SED7-Allin1 Piercingset v1.4)

2- Download my mod
3- Either apply it manually, unpack it, copy the all contents from my archive and place it at game\'s Data directory which is at steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data and overwrite when asked.
Or download my mod with NMM, install it through it, if it asks do you want to upgrade say NO and when it asks to overwrite say yes.
4- Play the game, go to the BanneredMare inn, find Scheherazade and buy some piercings!

[b]Note[/b]:
1- You MUST install Shazhar original mod version 1.4 ALLin1 single esp before mine, without it, my mod is useless.
2- My mod replaces Shazhar\'s .esp file, if you no longer want my mod but want the original mod, follow the uninstall instructions then reinstall Shazhar\'s original .esp


[b][size=3pt]:::::::: Uninstallation Instructions ::::::::[/size][/b]
0- If you bought a lot of piercings then you may want to sell them before uninstalling in order to get some of the gold you\'ve spent back
1- Get out of the BanneredMare inn, go somewhere else (some other cell preferably)
2- Save
3- Exit the game
4- Uncheck SED7-CBBE3-BM_ALLin1-EDITION.esp
5- Start the game and load the save you made last, click yes on the warning
6- Make a new save in a new slot and exit the game
7- Deactivate with NMM

OR if you want to do it manually
Go to Skyrim\\Data, delete SED7-CBBE3-BM_ALLin1-EDITION.esp
Go to Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\ then delete a folder named \"SED7-CBBE3-BM_ALLin1-EDITION.esp\"
Go to Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint and delete a folder named \"SED7-CBBE3-BM_ALLin1-EDITION.esp\"
10- Done


[b][size=3pt]::::::::: Incompatible With ::::::::::[/size][/b]
Non that I know of..


[b][size=3pt]:::::::: Permission :::::::::[/size][/b]
[size=4pt][b]I got permission from [color=yellow]Shazhar[/color] to publish this little mod. Credit goes to him.[/b][/size]
author: Foaman
